Topic.Title: Anyone using Activelit that can confirm they can still create games?

Posts.EditableText:
Is there anyone out there using Activelit? I saw in some posts for 2020 that it may not be supported anymore?

I'm still not able to create new games within activelit & am really hoping to use this with students in a few weeks.
Thank you!
